column4: hey.. I've been having a small problem with video in linux... it runs fine, but every now and then a lot of frames get dropped... is there a way to fix this? Someway to optimize my system?
I want to hook my laptop up to my HDTV so my friends can watch Final Fantasy VII Advent Children tomorrow night and want to be sure it never skips or gets choppy :)
it can also be that switching movie player helps. mplayer normally performs very well even on old hardware
